feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:08 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 10:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: NE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 6. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11.
